quality-tree.project-description: Typical requirements for a data warehouse where fast reporting on historical data is critical and fit for OLAP cube.

quality-attribute.name: Aggregate Reporting
quality-attribute.description: Allow non-techies to analyze large data sets using GUI.

quality-attribute2.name: Fast reports
quality-attribute2.description: Summarize billions of facts in under 1/4 second

quality-attribute2.name: Slice and dice tools
quality-attribute2.description: Users can filter and categorize facts with GUI

quality-attribute.name: Agility
quality-attribute.description: Ability to rapidly view new data.

quality-attribute2.name: New records added
quality-attribute2.description: New facts are added to the system

quality-attribute2.name: New reports
quality-attribute2.description: User can create and save reports

quality-attribute.name: Scalability
quality-attribute.description: Scale to millions or billions of facts

quality-attribute2.name: New fact added in bulk
quality-attribute2.description: New facts are added to the system

quality-attribute2.name: Aggregates recomputed
quality-attribute2.description: Aggregate data updated as facts are added
